title: Ahri club
body:
Hiya! I was just curious if anyone out there knew anyone in the club "Ahri", due to the fact I wish that I can join it. :) feel free to add me if you know someone who is in the club (so that way I can join it).
Thanks!
> - {{champion:103}} Challenger Ahri

replies.body: Is the name of the club Sluts R Us by anychance?
